name: CONSTELLAR CORP., Maryann Kurmlavage, and Woodland Terrace Homeowners' Association, Petitioners v. ZONING BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT OF THE CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, City of Philadelphia, OAP, Inc., Azalea Gardens Partners, LP and Trustees of University of Pennsylvania, Respondents

parties: CONSTELLAR CORP., Maryann Kurmlavage, and Woodland Terrace Homeowners’ Association, Petitioners v. ZONING BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT OF THE CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, City of Philadelphia, OAP, Inc., Azalea Gardens Partners, LP and Trustees of University of Pennsylvania, Respondents

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 15th day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
